akn:content.akn:p:
§ 90108. Annual audit The foundation shall enter into a contract with an independent auditor to conduct an annual audit of the foundation. (Added Pub. L. 107–252, title VI, § 601(a), Oct. 29, 2002, 116 Stat. 1721, § 152608; renumbered § 90108, Pub. L. 113–237, § 3(c)(6)(B), Dec. 18, 2014, 128 Stat. 2840.)
Editorial Notes Amendments2014—Pub. L. 113–237 renumbered section 152608 of this title as this section.
